item.title: Fall Out Boy - Immortals ("Big Hero 6"OST)
item.description:
작곡: Patrick Stump, Joseph.. / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 91178 / KY: 23170

They say
we are what we are
But
we don’t have to be
I’m bad
behavior
But I do it
in the best way
I’ll be the watcher
of the eternal flame
I’ll be
the guard dog
Of all
your fever dreams
Oh~ I am the sand
in the bottom
Half of the hourglass
(glass glass)
Oh~ I try
to picture me
Without you
but I can’t
‘Cause we could be
immortals immortals
Just not for long
for long
And live with me
forever now
You pull the blackout
curtains down
Just not for long
for long
We could be
immor~ immortals
Immor~ immortals
immor~ immortals
Immor~ immortals
immortals

the only pay-off
For having
any faith is
When
it’s tested
Again and again
every day
I’m still comparing
your past to my future
It might be your wound
but they’re my sutures
Oh~ I am the sand
in the bottom

Without you

item.title: Fall Out Boy - Centuries
item.description:
작곡: Andr.., Michael Fonseca / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79559 / KY: 22960

Some legends are
told
Some turn
to dust or to gold
But you will
remember me
Remember me
for centuries
And just one mistake
is all it will take
We’ll go down
in history
Remember me
for centuries
Hey ya oh hey
hey ya
Remember me
for centuries
Mummified
my teenage dreams
No it’s nothing wrong
with me
The kids are all wrong
the story’s all off
Heavy metal
broke my heart
Come on come on
and let me in
The bruises
on your thighs
Like
my fingerprints
And this is
supposed to match
The darkness
that you felt
I never meant for you
to fix yourself
Some legends are
told
Some turn
to dust or to gold
But you will
remember me
Remember me
for centuries
And just one mistake
is all it will take
We’ll go down
in history
Remember me
for centuries

hey ya

for centuries
And I can’t
stop
‘Til the whole world
knows my name
‘Cause I was only born
inside my dreams
Until you die for me
as long as
There’s a light
my shadow’s over you
‘Cause I I am the
opposite of amnesia
And you’re
a cherry blossom
You’re about to bloom
you look so pretty
But you’re gone
so soon
Some legends are
told
Some turn
to dust or to gold
But you will
remember me
Remember me
for centuries
And just one mistake
is all it will take
We’ll go down
in history

for centuries

hey ya

for centuries

forever
And here’s

I could scream
forever
We are
the poisoned youth

item.description:
작곡: W.Peter.., H.Andrew John / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 60297 / KY: 24880

She says
she’s no good
With words
but I’m worse
Barely stuttered out
“a joke of a romantic”
Or stuck to
my tongue
Weighed down
with words too
Over-dramatic
tonight it’s
“It can’t get
much worse”
Vs “no one should
ever feel like”
I’m two quarters
and a heart down
And I don’t
want to forget
How your
voice sounds
These words are
all I have
So I’ll
write them
So you need them
just to get by
Dance
dance
We’re falling apart
to half time
Dance
dance
And these are
the lives
You’d love to lead
dance
This is the way
they’d love
If they knew how
misery loved me

You always
fold just
Before you’re
found out

call last resort

first mistake

bargained for yet?

break a name

sleeping in

one with a bullet
